column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Katara says : " Umm , thanks for saving us Jet .
#Text=We were waiting to ambush those soldiers all morning , we just needed the right distraction , and then you guys stumbled in .
#Text=" Katara says : " We were relying on instincts .
#Text=" Jet says : " You 'll get yourself killed doing that .
#Text=" The Duke says : " Hey Jet , these barrels are filled of blasting jelly .
#Text=" Jet says : " That 's a great score .
#Text=" Pipsqueak says : " And these boxes are filled with jelly candy !
#Text=" Jet says : " Also good , let 's not get those mixed up .
#Text=" The Duke says : " We 'll take this stuff back to the hideout .
#Text=" Aang says : " You guys have a hideout ?
#Text=" Jet says : " You wan na see it ?
#Text=" Katara says : " Yes , we wan na see it !
#Text=" Jet says : " We 're here .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Where ?
#Text=There 's nothing here .
#Text=" Jet says : " Hold this .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Why ?
#Text=What 's this do ?
#Text=" Jet says : " Aang ?
#Text=" Aang says : " I 'll get up on my own .
#Text=" Jet says : " Grab hold of me , Katara .
#Text=" Aang says : " Nice place you got !
#Text=" Katara says : " It 's beautiful up here !
#Text=" Jet says : " It 's beautiful ... and more importantly the Fire Nation ca n't find us .
#Text=" Smellerbee says : " They would love to find you .
#Text=Would n't they , Jet ?
#Text=" Jet says : " It 's not gon na happen , Smellerbee .
#Text=" Katara says : " Why does the Fire Nation want to find you ?
#Text=" Jet says : " I guess you could say I 've been causing them a little trouble .
#Text=See , they took over a nearby Earth Kingdom town a few years back .
#Text=" Pipsqueak says : " We 've been ambushin ' their troops , cutting off their supply lines , and doing anything we can to mess with 'em .
#Text=" Jet says : " One day , we 'll drive the Fire Nation out of here for good and free that town .
#Text=" Katara says : " That 's so brave .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Yeah , nothing 's braver than a guy in a tree house .
#Text=" Katara says : " Do n't pay any attention to my brother .
#Text=" Jet says : " No problem .
#Text=He probably had a rough day .
#Text=" Katara says : " So , you all live here ?
#Text=" Jet says : " That 's right .
#Text=Longshot over there ?
#Text=His town got burned down by the Fire Nation .
#Text=And we found The Duke trying to steal our food .
#Text=I do n't think he ever really had a home .
#Text=" Katara says : " What about you ?
#Text=" Jet says : " The Fire Nation killed my parents .
#Text=I was only eight years old .
#Text=That day changed me forever .
#Text=" Katara says : " Sokka and I lost our mother to the Fire Nation .
#Text=" Jet says : " I 'm so sorry , Katara .
#Text=" Jet says : " Today , we struck another blow against the Fire Nation swine .
#Text=I got a special joy from the look on one soldier 's face , when The Duke dropped down on his helmet and rode him like a wild hog monkey .
#Text=Now , the Fire Nation thinks they do n't have to worry about a couple of kids hiding in the trees .
#Text=Maybe they 're right .
#Text=Or maybe ... they 're dead wrong .
#Text=" Katara says : " Hey Jet , nice speech .
#Text=" Jet says : " Thanks .
#Text=By the way , I was really impressed with you and Aang .
#Text=That was some great bending I saw out there today .
#Text=" Katara says : " Well , he 's great .
#Text=He 's the Avatar .
#Text=I could use some more training .
#Text=" Jet says : " Avatar huh ?
#Text=Very nice .
#Text=" Aang says : " Thanks Jet .
#Text=" Jet says : " So I might know a way that you and Aang can help in our struggle .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Unfortunately , we have to leave tonight .
#Text=" Jet says : " Sokka , you 're kidding me !
#Text=I needed you on an important mission tomorrow .
#Text=" Sokka says : " What mission ?
#Text="
